players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I am concerned about Alice's sudden disappearance. We should keep a close eye on each other and make sure no one else meets an untimely end."
You: "I'm glad we're all taking this seriously. Let's try to work together and share any information we might have that could help us figure out what happened to Alice."
